author: China Insights
description:
Yu Menglong’s case keeps escalating—the more it’s suppressed, the hotter it gets! Foreign Policy put it on the front page, the call for a Tiananmen memorial spread across the entire internet, and overseas co-signatures have surpassed 170,000. Song Yiren’s “third-generation red” background is being probed, and a Taiwanese lawyer’s “1,500-year sentence” thought experiment stunned public opinion. In this storm, who will ultimately be sacrificed? Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.

Welcome to China Insights — your window into the real China, beyond the veil.
With sharp analysis and a touch of dry humor, we dive into the social unrest, economic crises, censorship, faith suppression, and human rights challenges shaping China today.
We spotlight authentic Chinese culture, deliver timely and uncensored news, break down key economic trends, and explore shifting social dynamics — all while exposing the Chinese Communist Party’s complex roles both at home and on the global s
title: Yu Menglong Firestorm: 1,500-Year Shock

author: China Insights
description:
With just 16 days left until the CCP’s Fourth Plenum, a stunning bombshell has emerged! An unprecedented “anti-Xi letter” has surfaced, with signatories reportedly including Party elders like Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao, as well as current Central Military Commission (CMC) heavyweights Zhang Youxia and Liu Zhenli. The letter points directly at Xi Jinping’s errors over the past decade and more, calling on him to retire early. At the same time, over a hundred military vehicles from the 82nd Group Army headed north toward Beijing, shocking observers: is this a routine redeployment, or a deliberate signal? Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.

title: Xi Step-Down Signal? Anti-Xi Letter, Convoys to Beijing
